name: Red Balloon!
description:
Generate wind with your swipes and guide the red balloon to safety!

-----------------------------
Challenging levels, beautiful graphics, immersive gameplay.
-----------------------------

Once upon a time - there was a small balloon family. One day - story weather tore the red balloon away from its siblings. It ended up in a strange land of monsters, spikes and turbulent winds.
Can you help it find its way back?
